productTiles.title: Original Toilet Paper, 30 Equal 60 Rolls, 242 Bathroom Tissues per roll
productTiles.description:
Royale® Tissue Products are Carbon Neutral. You know you can trust Royale products for quality, but you may not know that the Royale brand is part of an organization that has planted more than one billion trees since 1957 and plants millions of trees each year in responsibly managed forests. Royale bathroom tissues, facial tissues, paper towel and napkins are carbon neutral. You can trust Royale as a carbon neutral choice, without compromising quality.

  • For over 60 years, Canadians have been bringing home Royale® Original, the Kitten-y Soft™ bathroom tissue. Every roll has kitten-y softness, so it always feels good to the touch. All Royale® bath products are made in Canada**.
  • Voted most trusted Bathroom Tissue by Canadian shoppers based on the 2023 BrandSpark® Canadian Trust Study. For information visit www.BrandSparkMostTrusted.com
  • Pack includes 30 rolls of 2-ply bathroom tissues with 242 Tissues per roll, 7260 Toilet tissue sheets in total
  • The Royale brand is part of an organization that plants millions of trees annually in responsibly managed forests, with a billion trees planted since 1957 and counting. For more information please visit www.Royale/carbon-neutral.com
  • Royale Home for Every Pet Project has shelter partners in every province across Canada, helping over 140 locations by generating awareness for their needs, contributing Royale products, and raising funds for in-shelter improvements. In 2024, the 5th year for RHEPP, Royale hosted a virtual fundraiser that generated over $580,000 for our partner animal shelters across the country!

productTiles.title: Velour Toilet Paper, 15 Equal 30 Rolls, 142 Bathroom Tissues per roll
productTiles.description:
Made in Canada with domestic and imported materials.

Royale Tissue Products are Carbon Neutral.

Each year, forests we manage remove more carbon than is emitted in the lifecycle of Royale tissue products.* The certification that Royale tissue products are carbon neutral is another step in a larger commitment to caring about the environment.

  • Canadians deserve a luxurious bathroom experience. And that’s what you can expect from Royale Velour bathroom tissue. It’s 40% thicker* for a plusher experience (than our Royale Original Brand).
  • Royale Tissue Products are Carbon Neutral. Each year, forests we manage remove more carbon than is emitted in the lifecycle of Royale tissue products. For more information please visit www.Royale/carbon-neutral.com
  • Pack includes 15 rolls of 2-ply bathroom tissues with 142 Tissues per roll
  • The Royale brand is part of an organization that plants millions of trees annually in responsibly managed forests, with a billion trees planted since 1957 and counting. For more information please visit www.Royale/carbon-neutral.com
  • Royale Home for Every Pet Project has shelter partners in every province across Canada, helping over 140 locations by generating awareness for their needs, contributing Royale products, and raising funds for in-shelter improvements. In 2023, on National Adopt a Shelter Pet Day, Royale hosted a virtual fundraiser that generated over $125,000 in one weekend for our partner animal shelters across the country!

productTiles.title: Max Soft Toilet Paper, 12 Double Rolls = 24 Single Rolls
Rolls Of Bathroom Tissue 3 Ply
Toilet Paper Ultra Soft, 24 Mega Rolls, 2-ply Bath Tissue
productTiles.description:
Get irresistible softness with Charmin Ultra Soft Smooth Tear™ toilet paper. Every roll is crafted with wavy edges that tear so much better vs. Leading 1000-sheet brand, so you can have a smooth, more enjoyable go. And each sheet of Charmin Ultra Soft Smooth Tear toilet paper is 2X more absorbent vs. Leading 1000-sheet brand, so you can use less! We made it MEGA in size, so you get MEGA value. 1 Charmin Ultra Soft Mega Roll equals 4 Regular Rolls, so you can change the roll less often based on the number of sheets in Charmin Regular Roll. Want to save even more time by running back to the store less? Stock up on Charmin toilet paper with our larger count packs! Charmin Ultra Soft Smooth Tear™ is also 2-ply and designed to be clog-safe and septic-safe. We all go, why not Enjoy The Go!

  • MEGA ROLLS, MEGA VALUE: Pack contains 24 Mega Rolls (208 Sheets Per Roll) of Charmin Ultra Soft Toilet Paper
  • VOTED #1 PRODUCT OF THE YEAR: Charmin Ultra Soft Smooth Tear was voted #1 Product of the Year (Bathroom Essentials Category, Survey of 40,000 people by Kantar)
  • TEARS SO MUCH BETTER THAN ORDINARY SQUARES: Has wavy edges that tear better vs. the leading USA 1-ply bargain brand
  • 2X MORE ABSORBENT: 2X more absorbent so you can use less vs. Leading 1000-sheet brand
  • IRRESISTIBLY SOFT: Irresistible softness you can feel
  • CLOG-SAFE AND SEPTIC SAFE: Satisfaction guaranteed or your money back.

productTiles.title: Toilet Paper Ultra Strong, 12 Mega Rolls
productTiles.description:
Get sparkly clean with Charmin Ultra Strong. It’s 4X stronger when wet vs. leading 1000-sheet brand and has a diamond weave texture. It’s woven like a washcloth and holds up when you wipe. It even cleans better so you can use less vs. leading 1000-sheet brand. We also made it MEGA in size, so you get mega value. That’s right, our Charmin Ultra Strong Mega Roll equals 4 regular rolls (based on number of sheets in Charmin Regular Roll bath tissue), so you’ll be running back to the store less and less. Our Charmin Ultra Strong toilet paper is also 2-ply and designed to be clog-safe and septic-safe so you can flush confidentially and keep clean. Never want to run out of Charmin? Buy in bulk size, larger count packs! We all go, why not Enjoy The Go with America’s favorite toilet paper, based on Total Charmin Brand Sales (Nielsen 2024 Dollar Sales).

  • Pack contains 12 Mega Rolls (220 Sheets Per Roll) of Charmin Ultra Strong Toilet Paper
  • 12 Mega Rolls = 48 Regular Rolls
  • Cleans better so you can use less vs. the leading 1000-sheet brand
  • 4X stronger when wet vs leading 1000-sheet brand, to keep your hands and hiney clean
  • Deeper Texture and Cleans Better vs. leading 1000-sheet brand
  • Cleans Better with fewer sheets and less effort vs. leading 1000-sheet brand
  • 1 Mega Roll = 4 Regular Rolls* *based on number of sheets in Charmin Regular Roll bath tissue
  • Made with a diamond weave texture and woven like a washcloth

productTiles.title: Ultra Comfort Toilet Paper, 24 Mega Rolls
productTiles.description:
Enjoy outstanding performance and softness with Cottonelle Ultra Comfort Toilet Paper. These Cottonelle toilet paper rolls feature Cottony Soft CleaningRipples that are designed to clean better and deliver unbeatable comfort, making them our softest ever. Plus, Cottonelle Ultra Comfort Bath Tissue is 3x more absorbent to help you feel comfortably dry. Our toilet paper is made with 100% plant-based fibers and is FSC-certified, sourcing fibers only from responsibly-managed forests. Each Cottonelle 2-Ply Mega Roll has 244 sheets per roll and is free of added perfumes and dyes. For more ways to feel clean, pair Cottonelle toilet paper with Cottonelle flushable wet wipes to remove up to 100% of residue and odour****. Keep Cottonelle stocked and order online with delivery.(****using wet + dry vs. dry alone)
  • 24 Mega Rolls of Cottonelle Ultra Comfort Toilet Paper; 244 sheets per roll; Cottonelle toilet paper packaging and product may vary
  • Superior Clean: Cottonelle bath tissue is designed to clean better
  • Our Softest Ever: Our toilet tissue is made with Cottony Soft CleaningRipples for unbeatable comfort
  • Our Most Absorbent: Our toilet paper rolls have CleaningRipples and are 3x more absorbent
  • Comfortable Clean: Cottonelle Ultra Comfort toilet paper is designed to remove residue and absorb moisture for a clean that’s comfortably dry
  • Comfy Meets Quality: Cottonelle 2-Ply Toilet Tissue is designed with comfort in mind so you can discover the value of a soft, absorbent roll
  • Cottonelle bath tissue is FSC certified, supporting responsible forestry and only uses fibers that are 100% plant-based
  • Pair Cottonelle toilet paper with Cottonelle flushable wipes together to remove up to 100% of residue and odour**** (****using wet + dry vs. dry alone)

productTiles.title: 3 Ply Rolls Of Bathroom Tissue
Ultra Clean Toilet Paper, 24 Mega Rolls
productTiles.description:
With Cottonelle Ultra Clean Toilet Paper, cleanliness meets quality. Cottonelle Ultra Clean Toilet Paper Rolls feature strong CleaningRipples that clean better and remove more in just one wipe. In fact, our toilet paper removes residue, reduces odour, and is safe for sensitive skin. Plus, Cottonelle Ultra Clean Bath Tissue is 3x thicker and stronger. Using fibers that are 100% plant-based, Cottonelle Toilet Paper is FSC-certified, supporting responsible forestry. Each Cottonelle 1-Ply Mega Roll has 284 sheets per roll and is free of added perfumes and dyes. For more ways to feel clean, pair Cottonelle toilet paper with Cottonelle flushable wet wipes to remove up to 100% of residue and odour****. Keep Cottonelle stocked and order online with delivery. (****using wet + dry vs. dry alone)

  • Superior Clean: Cottonelle bath tissue is designed to clean better
  • Thick & Strong: Our toilet tissue is 3x thicker and stronger
  • Removes More in One Wipe***: Our bath tissue removes residue, reduces odour, and is designed for sensitive skin (***vs. the leading US value brand)
  • Cottonelle Ultra Clean Toilet Paper is free of added perfumes and dyes
  • Cottonelle 1-ply toilet tissue is FSC certified, supporting responsible forestry and only uses fibers that are 100% plant-based
  • Pair Cottonelle toilet paper with Cottonelle flushable wipes together to remove up to 100% of residue and odour**** (****using wet + dry vs. dry alone)
  • Order Cottonelle toilet tissue online with delivery to your door or pickup in store

productTiles.description: Keep your kitchen clean with Double Rolls Paper Towels 6 Pack. With 2-ply sheets, these paper towels are strong and absorbent for handling everyday spills and messes. Each roll contains 90 half sheets.

productTiles.title: Club Size Super Absorbent Paper Towels
productTiles.description: Always have something handy that can wipe up those picnic table spills or sauce dribbles all season long. PC® Club Size Super Absorbent Paper Towels are designed to give you our best possible clean-up bang for your buck. You get 12 rolls (160 sheets per roll) of 2-ply, custom sheet sizing that makes cleaning up messes, from spilled juices to sticky faces, a summer breeze.

productTiles.description: Hypoallergenic, 2ply Facial Tissues in a convenient 6 pack format, with a selection of designs fit for any room in the home.

productTiles.title: Triple Rolls Paper Towels 6 Pack
productTiles.description: Clean up everyday spills and messes with Triple Rolls Paper Towels 6 Pack. These convenient half sheets are strong and absorbent. Made with 2-ply paper, each roll contains 135 half sheets.

productTiles.title: Paper Towels, Max Strength & Thickness, 8 Roll Pack
GentlePlus Flushable Wet Wipes with Aloe & Vitamin E, Adult Wet Wipes, 2 Flip-Top Packs, 42 Wipes Per Pack (84 Total Wipes)
productTiles.description:
Enjoy a complete clean with the #1 septic-safe wipes brand*, Cottonelle GentlePlus Flushable Wet Wipes. Our adult wet wipes are 100% flushable, septic-safe, and break down like toilet paper**. They’re made with aloe, vitamin E, and chamomile. Our flushable wipes are designed to help soothe skin and provide a gentle, refreshing clean. Plus, Cottonelle GentlePlus wet wipes are hypoallergenic, dermatologist-tested, and made with no harsh chemicals. Each flip-top pack has 42 flushable wet wipes per pack with pull-apart sheets for easy dispensing. Cottonelle is FSC certified, supporting responsible forestry and only uses fibers that are 100% plant-based. For more ways to feel clean, pair Cottonelle flushable wipes with Cottonelle toilet paper. Together, Cottonelle Ripples clean better***. Keep Cottonelle stocked and order online with delivery. (*among national brands) (**begins to break up as fast as Cottonelle Ultra Clean and has same break up after 30 minutes) (***Cottonelle dry + wet vs dry leading value brand)

  • WHAT'S INCLUDED — 2 flip-top packs of Cottonelle GentlePlus Flushable Wet Wipes, 42 flushable wipes per pack (84 wipes total); packaging may vary
  • GENTLE'S IN THE NAME — Each wet wipe is designed to help soothe skin and provide a gentle, refreshing clean
  • A REFRESHING CLEAN — Our disposable wipes are made with aloe, vitamin E, and chamomile to help you feel relaxed and refreshed
  • BREAKS DOWN LIKE TOILET PAPER* — Every flushable wipe breaks down like toilet paper, making them sewer- and septic-safe (*begins to break up as fast as Cottonelle Ultra Clean and has same break up after 30 minutes)
  • NO HARSH CHEMICALS — These hypoallergenic wipes are dermatologist-tested and free of MIT, parabens, and alcohol
  • FSC CERTIFIED — Cottonelle wipes only use paper from responsible sources
  • IT TAKES TWO — Flushable wipes and toilet paper are better together. Pair Cottonelle GentlePlus with Cottonelle Ultra Comfort for a complete clean
  • NEVER RUN OUT — Order Cottonelle wet wipes online with delivery to your door or pickup in store

productTiles.title: Fresh Care Flushable Wet Wipes, Adult Wet Wipes, 2 Flip-Top Packs, 42 Wipes per Pack (84 Total Flushable Wipes)
productTiles.description:
Enjoy a complete clean with the #1 septic-safe wipes brand*, Cottonelle Fresh Care Flushable Wet Wipes. Our adult wet wipes are 100% flushable, septic-safe, and break down like toilet paper**. Cottonelle Fresh Care flushable wipes remove up to 100% of residue, making them great for everyday use. Plus, they feature 3x cleaning power, designed to remove mess, reduce odor, and protect hands for a clean that feels complete. With no harsh chemicals, our adult wipes are made without MIT, parabens, or alcohol. Each flip-top pack has 42 flushable wet wipes per pack with pull-apart sheets for easy dispensing. Cottonelle wipes only use fibers that are 100% from sustainable sources. For more ways to feel clean, pair Cottonelle flushable wipes with Cottonelle toilet paper. Together, Cottonelle Ripples clean better***. Keep Cottonelle stocked and order online with delivery. (*among national brands) (**begins to break up as fast as Cottonelle Ultra Clean and has same break up after 30 minutes) (***Cottonelle dry + wet vs dry leading value brand)

productTiles.description:
